status.description:

* Puppet `puppet help` command line

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

# Script Variables & Constants
PUPPET_VERSION="@@{PUPPET_VERSION}@@"

# install puppet release rpm and puppet server.
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname --static @@{name}@@
sudo rpm -Uvh "http://yum.puppetlabs.com/puppet${PUPPET_VERSION}-release-el-7.noarch.rpm"
sudo yum install -y puppetserver

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
